metadata.title: CVE-2022-48738 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ASoC:ops: Reject out of bounds values in snd_soc_put_volsw() We don't currentlyvalidate that the values being set are within the range we advertised touserspace as being valid, do so and reject any values that are out ofrange.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-48738` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-33-generic - 5.15.0-33.34~20.04.1
linux-image-5.15.0-33-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-33.34~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-33-generic - 5.15.0-33.34~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-33-generic-64k - 5.15.0-33.34~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1014-aws - 5.15.0-1014.18~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1007-azure - 5.15.0-1007.8~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1019-azure-fde - 5.15.0-1019.24~20.04.1.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1048-fips - 5.4.0-1048.54
linux-image-unsigned-hmac-5.4.0-1048-fips - 5.4.0-1048.54
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1072-aws-fips - 5.4.0-1072.77+fips1
linux-image-unsigned-hmac-5.4.0-1072-aws-fips - 5.4.0-1072.77+fips1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1076-azure-fips - 5.4.0-1076.79+fips1
linux-image-unsigned-hmac-5.4.0-1076-azure-fips - 5.4.0-1076.79+fips1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1071-gcp-fips - 5.4.0-1071.75+fips1
linux-image-unsigned-hmac-5.4.0-1071-gcp-fips - 5.4.0-1071.75+fips1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1006-gcp - 5.15.0-1006.9~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1003-gkeop - 5.15.0-1003.5~20.04.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1033-ibm - 5.15.0-1033.36~20.04.1

No subscription required
